radiant dawn.name: Radiant Dawn
radiant dawn.desc:
Strike down your foes with your blinding light.
[*Guard breaks]

radiant kick.name: Radiant Kick
radiant kick.desc: Kick your foes at the speed of light.

blinding dawn.name: Blinding Dawn
blinding dawn.desc: Dance uncontrollably. No one can withstand the sheer groove of your spin routine.
